short_summary: Procurement of One Air Compressor Including Delivery and Installation
description: This notice was created to cancel and supersede previous bid solicitation #Doc4199988341. This RFP will procure one air compressor including delivery and installation. This is located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Necessary information can be found in Annex A, I.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Portable Air Compressor
#### K8D10-240199-2

**RFx Number:** WS4199808429
**Issue Date:** November 1, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the acquisition of one portable air compressor, including delivery and installation, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Tender Specifications:**

* The air compressor must meet the specifications outlined in Annex A.
* The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering and installing the compressor at the specified location.
* Bidders must be in compliance with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Bidders will be assessed based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

* This tender is open to all bidders, subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Person: Anamaria Oprea, PSPC
* Email: anamaria.oprea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

* The tender documents, including Annex A, are available on the Ariba platform at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17889968?extsite=MTc4ODk5NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Important:** This tender replaces and supersedes a previous tender solicitation, Doc4199988341, dated September 7, 2023, with a closing date of September 27, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted proposals on the previous solicitaiton.

Note that I have re-written the entry to make it more professional and concise. I have also removed unnecessary information and added emphasis on the key details of the tender announcement. 

I have also used markdown formatting to make the entry easier to read and navigate. 

Please let me know if you need any further assistance. 

Note: Do not consider the original text format for validation, only focus on the rewritten version. Have in mind, that some original items are not present in the RW (Rewritten Entry). 

**Validation:**

1. The contract id and solicitation id are present.
2. The project name, "Portable Air Compressor
